player.title: JW Player for HTML5
player.author: LongTail Video
player.description: The JW Player for HTML5 transforms video tags into full-featured, cross-browser video players. The player supports playback of MP4, OGG and FLV files, falling back to a Flash object if the browser does not support the file in HTML5. The player also contains a list of configuration options, a PNG skinning model and a full-featured, jQuery-style API.

flashvar.name: duration
flashvar.description: duration of the audio or video file, in seconds. Set this to make the controlbar display a duration before the file starts playing

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: location of the video or audio file to play.

flashvar.name: image
flashvar.description: location of the poster image; shown before the video starts and after it has completed.

flashvar.name: start
flashvar.description: position in seconds where playback has to start. Won't work for regular (progressive) videos, but only for streaming (HTTP/RTMP).

flashvar.name: height
flashvar.description: Height of the player in pixels.

flashvar.name: screencolor
flashvar.description: Background color (hex value) of the display as a hex code.

flashvar.name: width
flashvar.description: Width of the display in pixels.

flashvar.name: debug
flashvar.description: set this to true to let the player fire all its events to console.log(). This can be read e.g. by Firebug or the Safari error console.

flashvar.name: flashplayer
flashvar.description: location of the JW Player for Flash that is used for fallback in browsers that do not support HTML5. When set to false, the flashplayer fallback is not used.

flashvar.name: mute
flashvar.description: Mute all sounds on startup. This can be overridden by a user's cookie, which stores the user's last muting state.

flashvar.name: repeat
flashvar.description: Set this true to continously loop the video, instead of playing it once.

flashvar.name: volume
flashvar.description: Startup volume of the player. Can be 0 to 100. The user's last volume setting is saved in a cookie and overrides this flashvar.
